name: Keto-Friendly "Candied" Nuts
author: TERRIS911
summary: I make these over the holidays, and I follow a low-carb diet, these slow-roasted mixed nuts are addictive! The smell coming out of your kitchen will be spectacular! It is perfect for anyone on a reduced-carb or diabetic diet, and it is totally customizable, as you can put in any combination of nuts!
ingredients: ½ cup low-calorie natural sweetener (such as Swerve®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C)
Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray
Put sweetener in a small mixing bowl
Beat egg whites in a glass, metal, or ceramic bowl until frothy
Gradually add salt and cinnamon, continuing to beat until soft peaks form
Add pecans and stir until evenly coated with the spiced egg whites
Toss nuts in the sweetener until coated and spread out on the prepared baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour, stirring every 15 minutes
